page.title: 10BRIDPORT GUNDRY
page.content:
Bridport Gundry factory is about{300 {years old}and used to be powered by {water.}It is on 8 acres of land. The company{employs 300 people}now. They work from 8.00am to 5.00pm Monday to Thursday and on Friday they finish at 4.00pm. They have work shifts from 6.00am to 2.00pm all week. There have been accidents. There was one last week when a man got his hand in a machine and took the tops of his fingers off.
They make{sports nets, camouflage {nets, air cargo nets and fishing nets. They used to dry the nets in the street so that is why the{pavements in {Bridport are so wide.}They send their nets and ropes all over the world.
